item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。 随着科技板块继续反弹，美国股市有望跟随欧洲股市走高。电动汽车制造商 Rivian 因大众汽车（Volkswagen）的现金注入而走强，美国期权交易商则大胆押注降息。以下是今日市场动态— Morwenna Coniam.【原文：Good morning. US equities are poised to follow European stocks higher as the tech sector continues its rally. EV-maker Rivian is bolstered by a cash infusion from Volkswagen and US options traders are making a bold wager on rate cuts. Here’s what’s moving markets today — Morwenna Coniam.】

item.title: 法拉利计划订购价值 7500 美元的混合动力车和电动车电池服务
item.description: 法拉利公司（Ferrari NV）计划为其下一代混合动力和电动超级跑车提供延长保修服务，以缓解客户对电池组老化的担忧。【原文：Ferrari NV plans to offer an extended warranty service for its next generation of hybrid and electric supercars to soothe customer concerns over aging battery packs.】

item.title: 博雅银行豪赌交易型外汇业务带来稳定收入
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp. ）的货币交易收入中越来越大的份额来自于一个部门，该部门并不迎合高歌猛进的宏观对冲基金，而是迎合全球最大的企业和零售银行客户。【原文：A growing share of Bank of America Corp.’s currency trading revenue comes from a unit that isn’t catering to high-flying macro hedge funds but instead the world’s largest corporations and retail banking clients.】

item.title: 斯坦霍夫前首席财务官在首席执行官去世数月后出庭受审
item.description: 倒闭的南非零售商斯坦霍夫国际控股公司（Steinhoff International Holdings NV）前首席财务官周三出庭受审，三个月前，他的前老板在被要求向警方自首时自杀身亡。【原文：The former chief financial officer of collapsed South African retailer Steinhoff International Holdings NV appeared in court Wednesday, three months after his ex-boss died by alleged suicide when he was told to hand himself over to police.】

item.title: 帕内塔称欧洲央行必须做好应对任何政治冲击的准备
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员法比奥-帕内塔（Fabio Panetta）表示，欧洲央行决策者必须做好准备，应对在不确定性加剧的情况下可能出现的政治冲击所带来的影响。【原文：European Central Bank policymakers must be ready to handle fallout from political shocks that can occur amid heightened uncertainty, according to Governing Council member Fabio Panetta.】

item.title: 肯尼亚债券税被视为制约小型公司债市场发展的新障碍
item.description: 肯尼亚的公司债券市场已经饱受公司倒闭的困扰，当局计划对绿色债券征收预扣税，这使奄奄一息的公司债券市场面临新的挫折。【原文：Already haunted by a history of company collapses, Kenya’s moribund corporate bond market risks a fresh setback from authorities plans for a withholding tax on green bonds.】

item.title: 虚假购买使日本书店股价下跌 10
item.description: 一家二手书店连锁店听起来可能不像是股市波动故事的背景，但 Bookoff 集团控股有限公司的股价在发现员工虚假采购后，周三暴跌了 10%。【原文：A chain of second-hand bookstores may not immediately sound like the setting for a tale of stock-market volatility, but Bookoff Group Holdings Ltd. shares tumbled 10% Wednesday after discovering fictitious purchases by employees.】

item.title: 日元走软突破 160 点关键水平，引发干预风险
item.description: 日元兑美元汇率跌至 160 以上，接近 4 月份当局干预支撑货币时引发急剧逆转的水平，这引发了人们对当局可能再次采取行动的猜测。【原文：The yen weakened beyond 160 against the dollar, near levels that triggered a sharp reversal in April when authorities intervened to support the currency, raising speculation they may act again.】

item.title: Trafigura 在被嘉能可(Glencore)冷落的重大锌交易中占得一席之地
item.description: 在竞争对手嘉能可公司（Glencore Plc）放弃了之前达成的全部供应协议后，刚果民主共和国一个大型锌矿的产量将由包括贸易巨头 Trafigura 集团在内的几个新买家瓜分。【原文：Production from a large new zinc mine in the Democratic Republic of Congo will be split between several new buyers including trading giant Trafigura Group, after rival Glencore Plc backed away from a previous deal for the entire supply.】

item.title: 津巴布韦新货币 ZiG 在两个月后获得自己的代码
item.description: 津巴布韦的新货币在推出两个多月后被赋予了自己的代码，这是该南部非洲国家第六次尝试推出稳定的货币单位。【原文：Zimbabwe’s new currency was assigned its own code, more than two months after it was launched in the southern African nation’s sixth attempt to introduce a stable unit.】

item.title: 真主党在以色列-哈马斯战争中扮演什么角色？
item.description: 自 10 月 7 日以色列与巴勒斯坦激进组织哈马斯爆发新一轮战争以来，黎巴嫩民兵真主党通过军事行动声援哈马斯。真主党几乎每天都向以色列北部发射导弹、迫击炮弹、火箭弹和爆炸性无人机，促使以色列以牙还牙。现在，战斗的升级似乎使双方更接近全面战争。此外，真主党还威胁要将附近的岛国塞浦路斯（Cyp【原文：Since a new war broke out between Israel and the militant Palestinian group Hamas on Oct. 7, the Lebanese militia Hezbollah has expressed solidarity with Hamas through military action. It has fired missiles, mortars, rockets and explosive drones into northern Israel almost daily, prompting Israel to respond with its own fire. Now, an escalation of the fighting appears to have edged the two sides closer to all-out war. In addition, Hezbollah has threatened to bring the nearby island nation of Cyp】

item.title: 担心港口罢工的美国工业界敦促拜登重启谈判
item.description: 数十家美国行业协会敦促白宫帮助重启东海岸和墨西哥湾沿岸码头工人与港口运营商之间陷入僵局的谈判，称在全球供应链已经十分紧张的情况下，经济最不需要的就是罢工。【原文：Dozens of US industry associations urged the White House to help restart stalled talks between East and Gulf coast dockworkers and port operators, saying a strike is the last thing the economy needs amid already strained global supply chains.】

item.title: 加密货币做市商 GSR 任命罗森布伦和宋为联席首席执行官
item.description: 加密货币领域最大的做市商之一 GSR Markets 表示，Jakob Palmstierna 将从首席执行官的职位上转任总裁，Rich Rosenblum 和 Xin Song 将共同担任总裁一职。【原文：GSR Markets, one of the biggest market makers in crypto, said Jakob Palmstierna is shifting to the role of president from the position of chief executive officer, which will be shared by Rich Rosenblum and Xin Song.】

item.title: 交易员等待内阁公告，南非兰特走软
item.description: 在总统西里尔-拉马福萨（Cyril Ramaphosa）的政党被选举剥夺议会多数席位近一个月后，南非兰特连续第三天走软，交易员们在等待内阁任命的消息。【原文：The South African rand weakened for a third day as traders awaited news on the appointment of a cabinet, almost a month after elections stripped President Cyril Ramaphosa’s party of its parliamentary majority.】

item.title: 欧洲央行将在夏休后开始下一次战略审查
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，欧洲中央银行将很快开始对其货币政策战略进行下一次审查；这一进程可能会影响未来的利率行动及其对危机的反应。【原文：The European Central Bank will soon commence the next review of its monetary-policy strategy, according to people familiar with the matter — a process that could shape future interest-rate actions and its response to crises.】

item.title: 印尼企业对印尼盾持续下滑发出警报
item.description: 印尼公司对印尼盾疲软导致成本上升表示担忧。【原文：Indonesian companies are raising their concern over how the rupiah’s weakness is raising their costs.】

item.title: 瑞士坚持银行资本金计划，打击瑞银集团
item.description: 瑞士表示，尽管美国国内对全球银行资本标准的争论仍在继续，但瑞士仍将按计划实施全球银行资本规则，这可能会使瑞士最大的贷款机构瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）在竞争中处于不利地位。【原文：Switzerland said it will keep to its schedule for implementing global bank capital rules despite continued wrangling over the standards in the US, potentially putting its largest lender UBS Group AG at a competitive disadvantage.】

item.title: 印度卢比如何从亚洲波动最大的货币变成波动最小的货币
item.description: 印度卢比在十年间从亚洲最不稳定的货币之一变成了亚洲最稳定的货币之一。这一转变反映了印度日益增长的经济实力和中央银行为控制卢比的剧烈波动而采取的干预措施。随着印度债券本周将加入一个重要的全球指数，货币的稳定来得正是时候，这也增强了印度资产对投资者的吸引力。过大的波动使企业和投资者难以在印度投资。【原文：The Indian rupee has gone from being one of Asia’s most volatile currencies to among its most stable in the span of a decade. The turnaround reflects India’s growing economic heft and the central bank’s interventions to manage the rupee’s wild swings. With Indian bonds set to join an important global index this week, the currency’s stability couldn’t have come at a better time, burnishing the appeal of Indian assets for investors. Too much volatility makes it tough for businesses and investors a】

item.title: 在爱马仕和路威酩轩集团的帮助下，香港购物中心将耗资 10 亿美元进行升级改造
item.description: 香港置地控股有限公司（Hongkong Land Holdings Ltd.）和包括爱马仕（Hermes）和路易威登（Louis Vuitton）在内的零售租户将投资 10 亿美元改造该开发商在香港的高端购物中心，这是对香港奢侈品零售业投下的信任票。【原文：Hongkong Land Holdings Ltd. and retail tenants including Hermes and Louis Vuitton will invest $1 billion to revamp the developer’s high-end mall in Hong Kong in a vote of confidence in the city’s luxury retail industry.】

item.title: ICICI Prudential称印度长期债券需求将上升
item.description: 印度最大的保险公司之一表示，养老基金的增长和即将纳入的指数可能会支撑对印度长期债券的需求。【原文：Demand for India’s longer-duration bonds is likely to be supported from growth in pension funds and the upcoming index inclusion, according to one of the country’s largest insurers.】

item.title: 全球基金自 2017 年以来最看好印度股票期货
item.description: 在印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）重返第三个任期并承诺保持政策制定的连续性之后，外国人正在增加对印度股票衍生品的看涨头寸。【原文：Foreigners are ratcheting up their bullish positions on Indian equity derivatives after Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s return for a third term promised continuity in policy making.】

item.title: 彭博社法国民意调查：勒庞党扩大领先优势
item.description: 根据彭博社的民意调查，玛丽娜-勒庞领导的极右翼国民联盟在周日举行的法国第一轮临时立法选举前继续扩大领先优势，而埃马纽埃尔-马克龙总统领导的复兴党及其盟友则停滞在第三位。【原文：Marine Le Pen’s far-right National Rally has continued to widen its lead ahead of the first round of France’s snap legislative election on Sunday while President Emmanuel Macron’s Renaissance party and its allies have stalled in third place, according to Bloomberg’s poll of polls.】

item.title: 中国向澳大利亚、新西兰和波兰提供免签证待遇
item.description: 中国表示将向澳大利亚、新西兰和波兰公民提供免签证计划，这是中国与这些国家建立更紧密关系的最新迹象。【原文：China said it will extend its visa-waiver program to citizens from Australia, New Zealand and Poland in the latest sign of closer ties with the countries.】

item.title: 麦格理不畏熊市大军，日元有望升至 120 点
item.description: 日元多头最近基本上都销声匿迹了，但麦格理集团有限公司（Macquarie Group Ltd.）是一个明显的例外。【原文：Yen bulls have largely been in hiding recently, but one notable outlier is Macquarie Group Ltd.】

item.title: 交易商押注香港开发商新鸿基将迎来喘息机会
item.description: 由于新鸿基地产有限公司的股价在 15 年低点附近徘徊，投资者认为没有必要对冲更多跌幅。【原文：As Sun Hung Kai Properties Ltd. shares hover around a 15-year low, investors are seeing little need to hedge against more declines.】

item.title: 法国 2017 年大选带来截然不同的市场压力
item.description: 玛丽娜-勒庞的极右翼政党首次接近赢得法国政权时，激动的投资者出于对她可能造成的潜在经济损失的担忧，推高了债券收益率溢价。【原文：The first time Marine Le Pen’s far-right party got close to winning power in France, agitated investors drove up bond yield premiums out of concern for the potential economic damage she might cause.】

item.title: 集团称，液化天然气风险包括俄罗斯制裁和工厂老化
item.description: 据国际天然气联盟称，全球液化天然气市场面临着供应的不确定性，这些因素包括对俄罗斯燃料的制裁、工厂老化以及红海船只遇袭等。【原文：The global market for liquefied natural gas faces supply uncertainty from factors including sanctions on Russian fuel, aging plants and attacks on vessels in the Red Sea, according to the International Gas Union.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：股市将反弹
中国揭露政府资金滥用，凸显财政风险
item.description: 中国发现，官员们允许将从特别债券或中央政府预算中筹集的现金投资于不合格或已停工的项目，这使人们对当前财政措施在促进经济复苏方面的有效性产生了疑问。【原文：China discovered that officials allowed cash raised from special bonds or funds from the central government budget to be invested in subpar or halted projects, raising questions about the effectiveness of current fiscal measures in bolstering economic recovery.】
